data.name: we_applied_this_formula_to_calculate_your_total_glass_obligation
data.value: We applied this formula to calculate your total glass obligation

data.name: is_n_tonnes_the_total_glass_you_reported_to_the_nearest_tonne
data.value: is {0} tonnes (the total glass material you reported for {1} to the nearest tonne)

data.name: is_n_percent_recycling_target_for_glass_set_by_the_yyyy_regulations
data.value: is {0}% (recycling target for glass set by the {1} regulations)

data.name: your_total_glass_recycling_obligation_z_is
data.value: Your total glass recycling obligation (Z) is

data.name: your_glass_remelt_obligation_is_part_of_your_total_yyyy_glass_obligation
data.value: Your glass re-melt obligation is part of your total glass obligation. It is always rounded up to the nearest tonne. We used the formula set out in the {0} regulations to calculate it

data.name: is_n_percent_the_percentage_recycling_target_for_glass_remelt
data.value: is {0}% (recycling target for glass re-melt set by the 2024 regulations)

data.name: to_determine_your_remaining_glass_obligation
data.value: To determine your remaining glass obligation, we subtract the glass re-melt obligation from your total obligation.

data.name: how_we_calculated_your_recycling_obligation
data.value: How we calculated your recycling obligation
